posts.post_content:
Though some may grade a 1.5- 2 no 3s. Though offered as poor-fair so...  

I threw out the clipped, mouse eaten, written on and bicycle spokes examples. All presentable but creased (mainly Piedmonts). There may be dups. So, I'll toss in a few extras. Commons, with minor leaguers or southern leaguers (toledo, toronto, balt, buff, prov, memph).

Send me an offer by email please no PMs. Merci, Steve

PP gift shipping/ins extra.
